meanings.definition: The mental and moral qualities distinctive to an individual.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness and honesty are part of her character.
meanings.sent2: The main character in the story is brave and loyal.
meanings.sent3: His mischievous character always gets him into funny situations.
meanings.sent4: The old house has a character all its own, filled with history and charm.
meanings.sent5: The character of the villain in the movie is truly unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A person in a novel, play, or movie.
meanings.sent1: The author created a fascinating character in the protagonist.
meanings.sent2: The character of Sherlock Holmes is known for his deductive skills.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy character in the comedy always makes me laugh.
meanings.sent4: She played the character of a determined detective with great skill.
meanings.sent5: The character of the evil queen was portrayed with chilling perfection.

meanings.definition: A printed or written letter or symbol.
meanings.sent1: The word starts with the letter 'C', a character in the alphabet.
meanings.sent2: The ancient scroll contained mysterious characters that no one could decipher.
meanings.sent3: The secret code was made up of strange characters that puzzled everyone.
meanings.sent4: His signature had a unique character that made it easily recognizable.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti artist painted colorful characters on the wall.
